credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Memphis (Condominiums):  New York Times Advertisement
description:
The advertisement occupies the upper half of the page and is placed in two-thirds
of the horizontal space, ending at the right edge. A bordered rectangle, centered in the right half, is superimposed on a curved blob in a Memphis studio-style all-over pattern. Within the rectangle, Unheard of, in large upper and lower case type, is followed underneath by four lines of copy. On the left, a column of copy appears in the upper half, followed underneath by a cartoon-like sketch of the Memphis condominiums) downtown building, placed on the diagonal, upper right to lower left. Memphis [logo]/ downtown, followed by the address, is underneath.
name: advertisement
